mapper.sql: menu_id as menuId, parent_id as parentId, name as name, url as url, perms as perms, type as type, icon as icon, order_num as orderNum
mapper.select:
SELECT sm.menu_id AS menuId, sm.parent_id AS parentId, sm.name, sm.url, sm.perms, sm.type, sm.icon, sm.order_num AS orderNum FROM sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sm.menu_id = srm.menu_id
AND srm.role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu ( menu_id, parent_id, name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num ) VALUES ( #{menuId}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{url}, #{perms}, #{type}, #{icon}, #{orderNum} )
mapper.select: select * from sys_menu where parent_id = #{parentId} order by order_num asc
select * from sys_menu where type != 2 order by order_num asc
